code: var _require=require("@reduxjs/toolkit"),createSelector=_require.createSelector;var cartSelector=function cartSelector(state){return state.cart;};export var cartTotalSelector=createSelector([cartSelector],function(cart){return cart.reduce(function(a,b){return a+=b.quantity;},0);});export var cartTotalPriceSelector=createSelector([cartSelector],function(cart){return cart.reduce(function(a,b){return a+=b.price*b.quantity;},0);});
